sentences.en: A door to the left stood ajar.
After some minutes the door was sufficiently ajar for her to slip out.
sentences.cn: 过了几分钟门终于拉成半开,她得以通过了.

sentences.en: An ajar door turns up on the screen.
sentences.cn: 屏幕上出现了一扇虚掩着的门.

sentences.en: He is ajar with the world.
sentences.cn: 他与人处事总是格格不入.

sentences.en: He left the door ajar in case I needed him.
sentences.cn: 他虚掩房门，以防我会需要他。

sentences.en: He went downstairs, Miss Thompson was waiting for him with her door ajar.
sentences.cn: 他下楼时, 汤姆逊小姐微掩着门,在等着他.

sentences.en: On arriving at this door, he found it ajar.
sentences.cn: 走到门边, 他看见门是掩着的,留着一条缝.

sentences.en: The door ajar and Helen peeped in.
sentences.cn: 门微开着,海伦向里窥视.

sentences.en: The door was ajar, so the cat was able to come in.
sentences.cn: 门半开着, 因此猫可以进来.

sentences.en: The tower was closed for renovation, but the entrance door was ajar.
sentences.cn: 它的塔楼因修理而关闭, 但是入口处半开着.

sentences.en: WITH THE DRB , READ THE LEFT FRONT DOOR AJAR SWITCH STATUS.
sentences.cn: 利用DRB, 阅读左前门微开开关状态.

sentences.en: WITH THE DRB , READ THE LF DOOR AJAR STATE.
sentences.cn: 用DRB读左前门的微开状态.

words.tran_cn: 半开地；微开地；不协调地

trans.tran_en: a door that is ajar is slightly open

trans.tran_cn: 半开地；微开地；不协调地
